import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{getAdminStats}from'../../services/userService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminStats=()=>{const[stats,setStats]=useState({totalUsers:0,usersByRole:{},totalPlants:0,activeTasks:0});const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetchStats();},[]);const fetchStats=async()=>{try{const data=await getAdminStats();setStats(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching stats:',error);// Set default stats on error
setStats({totalUsers:0,usersByRole:{},totalPlants:0,activeTasks:0});}finally{setLoading(false);}};if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading statistics..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin-stats",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"System Statistics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stats-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Total Users"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-number",children:stats.totalUsers})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Total Plants"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-number",children:stats.totalPlants})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Active Tasks"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-number",children:stats.activeTasks})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"role-breakdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Users by Role"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"role-stats",children:Object.entries(stats.usersByRole).map(_ref=>{let[role,count]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"role-stat",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"role-name",children:role}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"role-count",children:count})]},role);})})]})]});};export default AdminStats;
